verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> And he heard אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> the words בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons לָבָן֙ <WH3837> of Laban's לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לָקַ֣ח <WH3947> hath taken away יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what לְאָבִ֑ינוּ <WH1> all that [was] our father's וּמֵאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what לְאָבִ֔ינוּ <WH1> and of [that] which [was] our father's עָשָׂ֕ה <WH6213> hath he gotten אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַכָּבֹ֖ד <WH3519> all this glory הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> beheld יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the countenance לָבָ֑ן <WH3837> of Laban וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold אֵינֶ֛נּוּ <WH369> not עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> toward כִּתְמ֥וֹל <WH8543> and behold it [was] not toward him as שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <WH8032> before

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> unto Jacob שׁ֛וּב <WH7725> Return אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲבוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1> of thy fathers וּלְמוֹלַדְתֶּ֑ךָ <WH4138> and to thy kindred וְאֶֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> become עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> And Jacob וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> and called לְרָחֵ֣ל <WH7354> Rachel וּלְלֵאָ֑ה <WH3812> and Leah הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> to the field אֶל־ <WH413> to his צֹאנֽוֹ׃ <WH6629> unto his flock

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said לָהֶ֗ן רֹאֶ֤ה <WH7200> unto them I see אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> countenance אֲבִיכֶ֔ן <WH1> your father's כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that it אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> is not אֵלַ֖י <WH413> toward כִּתְמֹ֣ל <WH8543> that it [is] not toward me as שִׁלְשֹׁ֑ם <WH8032> before וֵֽאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> but the God אָבִ֔י <WH1> of my father הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> hath been עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> against

וְאַתֵּ֖נָה <WH859> And ye יְדַעְתֶּ֑ן <WH3045> know כִּ֚י <WH3588> with בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all כֹּחִ֔י <WH3581> that with all my power עָבַ֖דְתִּי <WH5647> I have served אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִיכֶֽן׃ <WH1> your father

וַאֲבִיכֶן֙ <WH1> And your father הֵ֣תֶל <WH2048> hath deceived בִּ֔י וְהֶחֱלִ֥ף <WH2498> me and changed אֶת־ <WH853> מַשְׂכֻּרְתִּ֖י <WH4909> my wages עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> ten מֹנִ֑ים <WH4489> times וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not נְתָנ֣וֹ <WH5414> suffered him אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> but God לְהָרַ֖ע <WH7489> not to hurt עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> me

אִם־ <WH518> If כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> thus יֹאמַ֗ר <WH559> If he said נְקֻדִּים֙ <WH5348> thus The speckled יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall be thy שְׂכָרֶ֔ךָ <WH7939> shall be thy wages וְיָלְד֥וּ <WH3205> bare כָל־ <WH3605> all manner הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> then all the cattle נְקֻדִּ֑ים <WH5348> speckled וְאִם־ <WH518> and if כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> thus יֹאמַ֗ר <WH559> and if he said עֲקֻדִּים֙ <WH6124> thus The ringstraked יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall be thy שְׂכָרֶ֔ךָ <WH7939> shall be thy hire וְיָלְד֥וּ <WH3205> then bare כָל־ <WH3605> all manner הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> all the cattle עֲקֻדִּֽים׃ <WH6124> ringstraked
וַיַּצֵּ֧ל <WH5337> hath taken away אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> Thus God אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְנֵ֥ה <WH4735> the cattle אֲבִיכֶ֖ם <WH1> of your father וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> and given לִֽי׃

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בְּעֵת֙ <WH6256> And it came to pass at the time יַחֵ֣ם <WH3179> conceived הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> that the cattle וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> that I lifted up עֵינַ֛י <WH5869> mine eyes וָאֵ֖רֶא <WH7200> and saw בַּחֲל֑וֹם <WH2472> in a dream וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold הָֽעַתֻּדִים֙ <WH6260> and behold the rams הָעֹלִ֣ים <WH5927> which leaped עַל־ <WH5921> when הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> upon the cattle עֲקֻדִּ֥ים <WH6124> [were] ringstraked נְקֻדִּ֖ים <WH5348> speckled וּבְרֻדִּֽים׃ <WH1261> and grisled

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> spake אֵלַ֜י <WH413> then מַלְאַ֧ךְ <WH4397> And the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> of God בַּחֲל֖וֹם <WH2472> unto me in a dream יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> [saying] Jacob וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> And I said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> Here

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said שָׂא־ <WH5375> Lift up נָ֨א <WH4994> now עֵינֶ֤יךָ <WH5869> now thine eyes וּרְאֵה֙ <WH7200> and see כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָֽעַתֻּדִים֙ <WH6260> all the rams הָעֹלִ֣ים <WH5927> which leap עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> upon the cattle עֲקֻדִּ֥ים <WH6124> [are] ringstraked נְקֻדִּ֖ים <WH5348> speckled וּבְרֻדִּ֑ים <WH1261> and grisled כִּ֣י <WH3588> for רָאִ֔יתִי <WH7200> for I have seen אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> all that Laban עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> doeth לָּֽךְ׃

אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I הָאֵל֙ <WH410> I [am] the God בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <WH1008> of Bethel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you מָשַׁ֤חְתָּ <WH4886> where thou anointedst שָּׁם֙ <WH8033> in it מַצֵּבָ֔ה <WH4676> the pillar אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you נָדַ֥רְתָּ <WH5087> [and] where thou vowedst לִּ֛י שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it נֶ֑דֶר <WH5088> a vow עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now ק֥וּם <WH6965> unto me now arise צֵא֙ <WH3318> get thee out מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> from this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> and return אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> unto the land מוֹלַדְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH4138> of thy kindred

וַתַּ֤עַן <WH6030> answered רָחֵל֙ <WH7354> And Rachel וְלֵאָ֔ה <WH3812> and Leah וַתֹּאמַ֖רְנָה <WH559> and said ל֑וֹ הַע֥וֹד <WH5750> still לָ֛נוּ חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> unto him [Is there] yet any portion וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> or inheritance בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> court אָבִֽינוּ׃ <WH1> for us in our father's

הֲל֧וֹא <WH3808> not נָכְרִיּ֛וֹת <WH5237> alien נֶחְשַׁ֥בְנוּ <WH2803> Are we not counted ל֖וֹ כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מְכָרָ֑נוּ <WH4376> sell away וַיֹּ֥אכַל <WH398> us and hath quite גַּם־ <WH1571> also אָכ֖וֹל <WH398> devoured אֶת־ <WH853> כַּסְפֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH3701> also our money

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Surely כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעֹ֗שֶׁר <WH6239> For all the riches אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הִצִּ֤יל <WH5337> hath taken אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> which God מֵֽאָבִ֔ינוּ <WH1> from our father לָ֥נוּ ה֖וּא <WH1931> to us וּלְבָנֵ֑ינוּ <WH1121> that [is] ours and our children's וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now כֹּל֩ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָמַ֧ר <WH559> hath said אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> now then whatsoever God אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> then עֲשֵֽׂה׃ <WH6213> unto thee do

וַיָּ֖קָם <WH6965> rose up יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> Then Jacob וַיִּשָּׂ֛א <WH5375> and set אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֥יו <WH1121> his sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> נָשָׁ֖יו <WH802> and his wives עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַגְּמַלִּֽים׃ <WH1581> upon camels

וַיִּנְהַ֣ג <WH5090> And he carried away אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִקְנֵ֗הוּ <WH4735> all his cattle וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all רְכֻשׁוֹ֙ <WH7399> and all his goods אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which רָכָ֔שׁ <WH7408> which he had gotten מִקְנֵה֙ <WH4735> the cattle קִנְיָנ֔וֹ <WH7075> of his getting אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which רָכַ֖שׁ <WH7408> which he had gotten בְּפַדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֑ם <WH6307> in Padanaram לָב֛וֹא <WH935> for to go אֶל־ <WH413> to יִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> to Isaac אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וְלָבָ֣ן <WH3837> And Laban הָלַ֔ךְ <WH1980> went לִגְזֹ֖ז <WH1494> to shear אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנ֑וֹ <WH6629> his sheep וַתִּגְנֹ֣ב <WH1589> had stolen רָחֵ֔ל <WH7354> and Rachel אֶת־ <WH853> הַתְּרָפִ֖ים <WH8655> the images אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> were לְאָבִֽיהָ׃ <WH1> that [were] her father's

וַיִּגְנֹ֣ב <WH1589> stole away יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> And Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֥ב <WH3820> unawares לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> to Laban הָאֲרַמִּ֑י <WH761> the Syrian עַל־ <WH5921> in that בְּלִי֙ <WH1097> him not הִגִּ֣יד <WH5046> he told ל֔וֹ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בֹרֵ֖חַ <WH1272> that he fled הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיִּבְרַ֥ח <WH1272> So he fled הוּא֙ <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֔וֹ וַיָּ֖קָם <WH6965> with all that he had and he rose up וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> and passed over אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּהָ֑ר <WH5104> the river וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and set אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> his face הַ֥ר <WH2022> [toward] the mount הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> Gilead
וַיֻּגַּ֥ד <WH5046> And it was told לְלָבָ֖ן <WH3837> Laban בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> on the third כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בָרַ֖ח <WH1272> was fled יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> that Jacob

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> his brethren עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וַיִּרְדֹּ֣ף <WH7291> with him and pursued אַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> after him דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> journey שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days' וַיַּדְבֵּ֥ק <WH1692> and they overtook אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> him in the mount הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> Gilead

וַיָּבֹ֧א <WH935> came אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to לָבָ֥ן <WH3837> to Laban הָאֲרַמִּ֖י <WH761> the Syrian בַּחֲלֹ֣ם <WH2472> in a dream הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ הִשָּׁ֧מֶר <WH8104> unto him Take heed לְךָ֛ פֶּן־ <WH6435> not תְּדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> that thou speak עִֽם־ <WH5973> not to יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob מִטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> either good עַד־ <WH5704> or רָֽע׃ <WH7451> bad

וַיַּשֵּׂ֥ג <WH5381> overtook לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> Then Laban אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> Jacob וְיַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> Now Jacob תָּקַ֤ע <WH8628> had pitched אֶֽת־ <WH853> אָהֳלוֹ֙ <WH168> his tent בָּהָ֔ר <WH2022> in the mount וְלָבָ֛ן <WH3837> and Laban תָּקַ֥ע <WH8628> pitched אֶת־ <WH854> with אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> with his brethren בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in the mount הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָבָן֙ <WH3837> And Laban לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> to Jacob מֶ֣ה <WH4100> What עָשִׂ֔יתָ <WH6213> What hast thou done וַתִּגְנֹ֖ב <WH1589> that thou hast stolen away אֶת־ <WH853> לְבָבִ֑י <WH3824> unawares וַתְּנַהֵג֙ <WH5090> to me and carried away אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתַ֔י <WH1323> my daughters כִּשְׁבֻי֖וֹת <WH7617> as captives חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> dagger

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why נַחְבֵּ֙אתָ֙ <WH2244> secretly לִבְרֹ֔חַ <WH1272> Wherefore didst thou flee away וַתִּגְנֹ֖ב <WH1589> and steal away אֹתִ֑י <WH853> וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and did not הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <WH5046> from me and didst not tell לִּ֔י וָֽאֲשַׁלֵּחֲךָ֛ <WH7971> me that I might have sent thee away בְּשִׂמְחָ֥ה <WH8057> with mirth וּבְשִׁרִ֖ים <WH7892> and with songs בְּתֹ֥ף <WH8596> with tabret וּבְכִנּֽוֹר׃ <WH3658> lyre

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and did not נְטַשְׁתַּ֔נִי <WH5203> And hast not suffered לְנַשֵּׁ֥ק <WH5401> me to kiss לְבָנַ֖י <WH1121> my sons וְלִבְנֹתָ֑י <WH1323> first עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> henceforth הִסְכַּ֥לְתָּֽ <WH5528> foolishly עֲשֽׂוֹ׃ <WH6213> in [so] doing

יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> It is לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> in the power יָדִ֔י <WH3027> of my hand לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do עִמָּכֶ֖ם <WH5973> you רָ֑ע <WH7451> you hurt וֵֽאלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> but the God אֲבִיכֶ֜ם <WH1> of your father אֶ֣מֶשׁ ׀ <WH570> unto me yesternight אָמַ֧ר <WH559> spake אֵלַ֣י <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying הִשָּׁ֧מֶר <WH8104> Take thou heed לְךָ֛ מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> that thou speak not עִֽם־ <WH5973> with יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> to Jacob מִטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> either good עַד־ <WH5704> or רָֽע׃ <WH7451> or bad

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now הָלֹ֣ךְ <WH1980> And now [though] thou wouldest needs הָלַ֔כְתָּ <WH1980> be gone כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because נִכְסֹ֥ף <WH3700> because thou sore נִכְסַ֖פְתָּה <WH3700> longedst לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> after thy father's לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> why גָנַ֖בְתָּ <WH1589> [yet] wherefore hast thou stolen אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> angels

וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לְלָבָ֑ן <WH3837> to Laban כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because יָרֵ֔אתִי <WH3372> Because I was afraid כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> for I said פֶּן־ <WH6435> Peradventure תִּגְזֹ֥ל <WH1497> thou wouldest take by force אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1323> thy daughters מֵעִמִּֽי׃ <WH5973> is yours

וַיִּזְבַּ֨ח <WH2076> offered יַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> Then Jacob זֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2077> sacrifice בָּהָ֔ר <WH2022> upon the mount וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called לְאֶחָ֖יו <WH251> his brethren לֶאֱכָל־ <WH398> to eat לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> bread וַיֹּ֣אכְלוּ <WH398> and they did eat לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> bread וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <WH3885> and tarried all night בָּהָֽר׃ <WH2022> in the mount
